about.professionalSummary: I am a recent honours graduate in the field of Information Intelligence. Durig my academic career, I have gained empaccable prenstation skills as I was honoured to reperent UJ at the University of Namibia delevring the College of Business and Economics Project on business development. Despite my two majors in Information Management and Business Management, I am doing a short course in PowerBI. My current interests has led to me to Software Development which is facilitated by Uj & Acenture. My ultimate goal is to venture into the tech space, I aspire to engineer, mage and protect digital systems.

phrases.englishPhrase: Education is the key to success
phrases.foreignLanguage: Onderwys is die sleutel tot sukses

favouriteSubjects.name: Business Intelligence
favouriteSubjects.description: This module shaped and inpsired my perpective regarding my career path. It involves content that explains how organisations can use intellegnce and digital systems to stay competitve and create simple and mordern business systems.

favouriteSubjects.name: Competitive Intelligence
favouriteSubjects.description: I enjoyed this module because it focues significantly of the using technology to staty competeitive. I enjoyed it becuase it wwas relevant, it encoraged innovation and staying relevant in a cometetive market or industry.

favouriteSubjects.name: Information Management
favouriteSubjects.description: This module invloves the managgent of data and information and how they can  be used to make analysis and decisions that impact the business positively.
